HOME.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Mini app used mainly for testing purposes.
HOME.LONG_DESCRIPTION: It allows you to manage easily your home budget. Finance Ninja is here to help you track your daily expenses and incomes. You can use it on both mobile devices and desktop versions so no other tool is needed. Just add some data to see daily results. App offers support for analysis of your expenses including charts.

SIGN_UP.GET_STARTED: Get started with a free account
SIGN_UP.EMAIL_INFO: Please enter a valid email address
SIGN_UP.PASSWORD_INFO: Password must be at least 5 characters
